Import a list of BigWig files.

importBWlist.Rd

This function imports multiple BigWig files into a list of rtracklayer::BigWigFile objects.

Usage

importBWlist(bwf, names, selection = NULL)

Arguments

bwf

A character vector specifying the paths to the BigWig files.

names

A character vector specifying the names to assign to the elements of the resulting list.

selection

An optional GRanges or RangesList object specifying the genomic regions to import from each BigWig file. If NULL (default), the entire file is imported.

Value

A named list of rtracklayer::BigWigFile objects.

Examples

# Assuming you have BigWig files named "file1.bw" and "file2.bw"
# and a GRanges object named 'regions'
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
bigwig_files <- c("file1.bw", "file2.bw")
file_names <- c("sample1", "sample2")

# Import the entire files
bw_list_full <- importBWlist(bigwig_files, file_names)

# Import only the specified regions
bw_list_selected <- importBWlist(bigwig_files, file_names, selection = regions)
} # }
